QuestData.Title: Seek and Destroy
QuestData.Description: <The Banshee Queen's voice invades your thoughts once more.>$B$BSearch the nearby farmhouses for Alliance stragglers. Keep an eye out for any information that could lead us to Crowley and Bloodfang. Seek and destroy all that would stand in your way, $n!
QuestData.PortraitTurnInText: They will be cornered and crushed!
QuestData.LogDescription: Search the Farmhouses at Olsen's Farthing.
QuestData.RewardText: <The Banshee Queen's words float in your head.>$B$BThis book documents a recent meeting with Ivar Bloodfang. The location mentioned is the Deep Elem Mine. I know of this place. It has only one entrance.$B$BWe shall corner and crush them!
